sentences.sContent: Common units of volume are cubic centimeter.
sentences.sContent_eng: Common units of volume are cubic centimeter.
sentences.sCn: 常见的体积单位是立方厘米。

sentences.sContent: The scale of this map is one centimeter to the kilometer.
sentences.sContent_eng: The scale of this map is one centimeter to the kilometer.
sentences.sCn: 这个地图的比例是用一厘米代表一公里。

phrases.pCn: n. 平方厘米，平方公分

remMethod.val: cent(百) + i + meter(米) → 百分之一米 → 厘米
